document_data.mainbody:
The fiendish moon was an enchanted sickle that appeared to blaze with fire. It could be found in Waterdeep as of the late 15 century DR.
A strike from the fiendish moon had a similar effect as the vampiric touch spell, inflicting harm while restoring some of the wielders vitality.
* Farideh, a tiefling warlock, possessed a fiendish moon while adventuring in Waterdeep.
